documents.document: @samdoestuff @TayMals I just watched the episode and this is so... I think it's my favorite Daddarioism yet! [evil chuckles.].
@WainwrightAE I'd keep a baby warlock. Conceptions a bit rough but I wouldn't care about any potential blueness. Having a magic kid is cool.
@Eskim089 @DomSherwood1 Oh! Banana peppers... What are banana peppers? Are they delicious?
@TatoBins My go to party icebreaker.
@hollieoverton This moved my heart. Warming and empowering!
@hollieoverton @EliotACohen @TheAtlantic Thank you for sharing this. Thank you for your bravery. You're a pretty wonderful human.
@Sunafiction To generalize again, Australians are good at being cynical- not easily taken in by sensationalism. It also makes us apathetic.
@Sunafiction Also think that protest do and have worked to reinforce a passion for human rights. A desire for justice, togetherness, truth.
@Sunafiction The Western political landscape is more oligarchical than democratic.
@Sunafiction While I agree with a philosophical subset saying protests don't enact political change because true democracy is nonexistent.
To generalize, I've always admired US energy. The ability to be provoked means that protests are happening in force across the States.
@Swtbtrygd @IvanDale @aravosis the world wouldn’t be fucking screwed. The Republican party became the cartoon villian stereotype of itself.
@Swtbtrygd @IvanDale @aravosis If the Republican party cared less for powerplay and more for responsibility to its people...
@mattdirector love to you all! Thanks for the hard work!
@ZOmygawd @toddzer1 @DSwim @TVLine I look forward to discovering the journey! I'm sure it'll be a wild ride! It has been so far. 💜
@HarryShumJr happy new year! 🎆🎋
@Katy_L_Wood @chocobear_ I feel this right now. I started writing reviews because I loved talking about the characters, but I wish I hadn't
@pedestriandaily What the fuck did he think Labour Day commemorated before he was corrected!? [Face in palm and shakes head.].
@peterchayward that’s perfect!
@ZOmygawd @AlicaDelos @willtudor1 Welcome Sebastian! I've wished 4 an edit function too. My spelling & grammar game can lag in first drafts.
@teelingvillasin @HarryShumJr @samdoestuff No words can articulate the love and appreciation I've for Harry as Magnus. He makes Magnus his.
@veschwab is this actually non-fiction? I think i'm going to throw up.
Playing would you rather have China or the USA as your totalitarian global government hegemon became heavy-hearted really quick. Regret.
@KhaledBeydoun @inexorablist racism is top down and has always been top down.
Trump wouldn’t have happened if the political climate valued education over ego. Politicians should be public servants, not little kings.
The moment a series of ethics lectures as a date destination is met with joyful enthusiasm-- is the moment you realise you're both nerds.
@hollieoverton Oh! 💔 I hope your heart heals soon. ❤
@toddzer1 'Parabatai Lost' was lovely. The chapter that has affected me most so far! Well done Shadowhunters team. Thanks for the hard work.
@samcvincent I hope everything works out okay and that you, your family, and the animals are safe!
@Kat_McNamara @WainwrightAE “Words, words. They're all we have to go on!” Oh wait, wrong play...
@NickDSagar It would also be glamoured so only Shadowhunters could read it, right? #Shadowhunters
@zachug @NickDSagar @nialltojade My friend has a cat called Pat. #PatTheCat
@Kat_McNamara @ShadowhuntersTV PUNish me all you want. I love it! 🙃
@HarryShumJr Do pictures of cute animals make you feel better? (Be well! x) https://t.co/KdbbfCMYdZ
Where do all my deleted words go? Do they huddle together to make a new story somewhere?
@reketrebn @toddzer1 @ShadowhuntersWR I saw it as a moment where M was surprised by how sincere and different this Nephilim was to others. 😍
@reketrebn @toddzer1 @ShadowhuntersWR also liked in their 1st book meeting when M speaks of his past and A assures him it wasn't his fault.
@taylormar7777 @toddzer1 @ShadowhuntersWR I replied to the wrong comment!I meant to reply to @reketrebn. Still, both are nice comments!
@taylormar7777 @toddzer1 @ShadowhuntersWR Have a feeling it happens different in the show though. M's pretty far gone & A hasn't done much.🤔
@taylormar7777 @toddzer1 @ShadowhuntersWR Oh, that moment was one I always liked. Telling. Falling for someone's willingness to protect you.
@Shelby_Rabara Alright, I simmered down. But seriously, there are many gorgeous humans with Asian heritage. Shelby & Harry: case in point.
@Shelby_Rabara what idiot said that!? Ahem (@IAmSteveHarvey). A tired and very racist stereotype that is so freaking easy to shatter.
I don't think I understand the USA anymore. I thought I did. But I don't. https://t.co/Ejyqxx4maa
@MatthewDaddario Here's where I'd normally make a vitamin D joke, but you already did. It'll seem derivative.
@MatthewDaddario That one was so goooood! 😂😎
@ZOmygawd @ShadowhuntersWR (@MatthewDaddario reading the scripts): 'Is there a conspiracy or a bet?'
M: What's a poly fear? My leading a romantic tribe potential? J: Related more to you being giving and easily hurt. M: ... Way to be sincere.
@mattdirector @BrooseMiller @erictuchman @sugarjonze @NinaFioreBXLA @with_a_j - @MargaretAtwood is the best! it's so close @JoshuaBell243!!
@TayMals scenes were truly chilling. @DomSherwood1 was particularly killing it this ep. Perfectly acted. Also, a great script @TheRealReisz!
@TayMals the whole, 'You did it for yourself' scene was my favorite. I'm looking forward to Alec realising Magnus's worth. Also, the Jace
@TayMals 'But that is no excuse for treating me like [this].' 💜 https://t.co/Cj4U4e7ijc
@samdoestuff Ya know, I don't think Matt is all that difficult to understand. What you see appears to be what you get. 🤔
@Eskim089 If taken as an endowment, U could totes slip into the role of Emperor! Also, Matt could evaporate the Pacific with that wit.
@MatthewDaddario Those buzzfeed answers were so dry they dehydrated me.
@MatthewDaddario #TheConstrictingOfMagnusBaneSassIsWhyYouShouldHateCensorship
@MatthewDaddario Do we see Alec come to realize how poorly Downworlders are treated? How poorly Magnus was/is treated? #ShadowhuntersChat
@HarryShumJr Dem mortals he cares about being all reckless and fast moving! #PoorMB #MostlyChill #Also #QuietlyFretful #ShadowhuntersSeason2
@MalecsAngel @toddzer1 They think of themselves as monstrous and unlovable but J deals with it by spiraling while M accepts it resignedly..
@MalecsAngel @toddzer1 (Okay, thought about it more and came back.). I think the tension is where M&J's similarities and differences meet..
"be a nice person, advocate for yourself diplomatically, say, “yes, I can do that” even when frightened, and work" https://t.co/g2UA1FLCV4
@harryshumjrnet @samdoestuff @HarryShumJr He's gorgeous. 🤣😍
@Shelby_Rabara You and @HarryShumJr are the best of people. Hope all your artistic endeavors are full of fruit!!! Happy 2017. xo
@samdoestuff I had a moment of, 'Oh fuck!' *Looks at time* but not yet here! Happy 2017 lovely lady!
@samdoestuff Yep. Unimaginative, unnecessary. It’s the gratuitous carelessness that upset me. There is more than one example in the writing.
@samdoestuff if I'm honest, so did I! There's a sexually violent scene I thought was written very thoughtlessly. Hot rather than horrific.
@samdoestuff I think it might've been the 6th book actually...
@samdoestuff There is a scene in the 5th book (I think) that I still can't read all the way through because it upsets me too much.
@samdoestuff I guess one of my majors was archaeology so incest as a thing never shocks me anymore. Issues around consent though..
@samdoestuff I was less disturbed by C+J hooking-up when they knew they were siblings, more so by Sebastian trying to seduce C when he knew.
@baneandlewis @ShadowhuntersTV @arosende Oh man, Simon is freaking cute. Look at that sweet face. #EveryCharactersAGonerForSimon #ExceptAlec
@TayMals @hollieoverton @ShadowhuntersTV Can't wait! It'll be so wonderful that I write paragraphs of gush on Tumblr. (Also, I miss Magnus).
@MalecsAngel @toddzer1 I also think they're very different. Magnus is more mature, diplomatic, intelligent, and is the opposite of selfish.
@MalecsAngel @toddzer1 I imagine baby Magnus being more Jace-like. I think they have similar perceptiveness and emotional armor.
@toddzer1 @MalecsAngel (I don't think Magnus&Jace are similar, but they may share some similarities that M would pick up on and not like.)
@toddzer1 @MalecsAngel I think less because of jealousy and more cause Jace has many characteristics Magnus has had to work on in himself..
@toddzer1 @MalecsAngel Their dynamic is hilarious! In the books, J is the only one M is truly petty and immature towards.
What I dislike about politics: politicians who don't take responsibilities earnestly, but use a powerful platform to realise their own ego.
@Sunafiction Anything else is prejudice. Prejudice is not the same thing as racism. /end
@Sunafiction Abuse enacted towards someone because of thoughtless unquestioning of those institutionally constructed biases is racism. /5
@Sunafiction Powerful institutions and conventional wisdoms were built from those justifications. They still exist, consciously & subcon. /4
Go naked. Shed the masks. Those society assigns its members and those the individual creates for themselves in response. #MakeArendtProud
@Brocklesnitch They found him asleep in a backyard later. Tuckered out after his slow morning rampage.
@samdoestuff #BookishAndIntelligentMalecIsLife #ShadowhuntersSeason2
@harryshumjrnet @HarryShumJr haha, of course you did! (So did I 😊.).. Merry family and joy time excellent people! X
@merenahti A movie with a Hollywood ending that could only come from a corporate entity. Far removed from an actual human emotional response
@WomenNMedia @mic Not pro-life. They're pro-birth. These people are the first to demand scraping social services that help support lives.
@veritymus_prime haha, my thought process is usually, 'Oh, that looks like a cool human!' But thank you for being understanding! X
@veritymus_prime Hi! I'm a SH fan and recently followed your instagram before I saw it was private. Sorry for crossing that boundary! X
@hollieoverton (thank you for listening to me nerd out about the internet 😳)
@hollieoverton It opens up so many learning opportunities for people who wouldn't ordinarily have those opportunities without it. :D
@hollieoverton I'm trying to learn an American accent for some voice-over work and have multiple youtube tabs open! The internet is magical!
@hollieoverton Hmm, don't have the funds right now. Next time. Won't stop me from writing though! I'll experiment with a few script ideas..x
@hollieoverton Cool! I'm always up to learning new writing skills. Maybe I should start writing scripts too? Collaborative writing is fun!
@CAPEUSA @e_alexjung @vulture Hollywood racism was always a problem. It's almost simple-minded not to see that. Have to be willfully dense.
@CAPEUSA @e_alexjung @vulture So good! Hollywood keeps hollowing itself of substance. I want it to stop being unworldly. More thoughtful.
@samdoestuff @HarryShumJr How could you not? Many of the exaggerated positive adjectives apply to him while still seeming a grounded human!
@HarryShumJr @SOFTJlMON Operating System! Should've known. I know computers! #SomewhereInCBRMyPartnerIsExperiencingAnOddSenseOfDisagreement
@HarryShumJr @SOFTJlMON It's okay, I'll google it. 🤔🙃
